Class AnimationExample

java.lang.Object
  ConvexHullAlgorithm
      AnimationExample

public class AnimationExample
extends ConvexHullAlgorithm

This subclass of ConvexHullAlgorithm simply demonstrates how to implement animations; it DOES NOT correctly compute convex hulls.

Author:
Justin Johnson

Method Detail

convexHull

public java.util.List<Point> convexHull(java.util.Set<Point> points)
An example which demonstrates how to implement animation. Note that it DOES NOT correctly compute the convex hull of the input set!

Specified by:
convexHull in class ConvexHullAlgorithm
Parameters:
points - The points for which the convex hull is to be computed.
Returns:
A List containing the convex hull of the input set, where the points are ordered either clockwise or counterclockwise around the bounding polygon.
